I am the Labour Member of Parliament for Luton North.
Luton is my home and I love it. I am proud to champion our communities for the causes that matter. I am an active campaigner – from issues such as smart motorways, baby loss, anti-social behaviour and accessible public transport, I have used my voice to stand up for causes I believe in and ensure our town has proper representation.
This is my website where you can follow the campaign as find contact details and useful resources for help and support.
